name: The Tomb of the Silver Serpent

sections.title: A. Village Edge
sections.content:
Old Maera meets you by a standing stone: "Bring back the idol and hush the hill."

Roll Reaction or use an Influence roll as a Quick Contest.

sections.title: B. Sink-Stairs
sections.content: Collapsed stone stairs spiral into dark. Tie rope; roll Climbing (start; then each 5 min). Apply Encumbrance. Failure → Falling; Jumping help.

sections.title: C. Whispering Antechamber
sections.content: Faint sibilant whispers drift from ahead. Hearing to parse. Then a chill passes—make a Fright Check (+2 if Combat Reflexes).
